Hey guys, read this if you have problems!

When I used this crack and I tried to wiev uplay or friends it would tell me that ubisoft servers weer down. It also searched forever for games.

And I found the solution. Look into your hosts file, and DELETE all lines which contain the urls to ubisoft servers. You might have them here becuse you used AC2 crack. If you keep the lines, it will prevent your computer from connecting to the ubi servers, thats why it doesn't work! So just delete them and it should work :)

ok guys everthing is working perfectly so stop crying
all u need is to download the game iso and install with net connection off and then copy the contents of the multi crack provided my skidrow and copy all the 5 files in the system>src folder and dont copy the r2 file in the c drive ubisoft game launcher just copy that file also in the src folder of splinter cell....
now click on the exe file of splinter cell and play the fucking game....if u need and want to play co-op or multi then u need to have a real account in ubisoft if u have one then open ini file of skidrow and change the name and password there with ur account details after that u can play multi also but remember lan will not work so go to join match and then host a private match in that invite friends to play with u
to add friends in the menu click add friends thats it
if u are gettin the server error that means u havent copied the crack correctly and if u r gettin the error 2 code problem that means ur antivirus is stoping the r2 file from running add it to the list of allowed program and it should work
u can even unlock and buy upgrades with the point u earn with a real account

To join/create a game, with a friend you need to add his Ubisoft name (account to your "friends" while u create a game. then when both are online you "invite" him/her/it to join your game, he has to both accept your invite as a friend, and accept to join your game. @ people with start up erros-

check/update: sound, graphics, directx drivers etc.

ofc make sure your pc spec  is up to par (for me when i initially loaded the game I had black screen, however it became visible when it got to the 'push any key to start' bit... once I changed resolution and gfx settings in game this problem resolved.

another thing people when you invite somebody sometimes when they click accept they will get an error such as server down or unable to connect.. this happened to me a few times now so if people dont join dont assume they are ignoring you just send a another invite a few more times..

when that happens to me i usually quickly host a game myself and invite that person who just tried to invite me instead which more often or not seems to work

---------------

hope this helps, enjoy the online sensation
